website_summaries.verdict: Chrome and glass end table presents an striking modern look, while also giving you a useful end table.
pros: Four curved base legs use a chrome finish that looks great while also sturdily supporting the table top
Tempered glass top has a stylish black frame
Impressive mixture of sturdiness and style
cons: Assembly can be a little tricky

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful table- but the black ring around the top of ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful table- but the black ring around the top of the glass makes it look less modern. Also, after using a specific type of glass cleaner, (which could have been my fault for not doing a spot test first) some of the black strip looks as if it’s worn or chemically faded. That cleaner did a number on it. :( Update- after having this table a while, the glass is easily scratched, and that same black ring has faded more and looks terrible. I don’t know if this was continued degradation from the cleaner, or just a bad product.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice contemporary end tables
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 end tables and had them put together in less than an hour (taking my time). I love the way these things look and the glass is kinda thick, so I know it's not going to break easily. Assembly was a little annoying, but the trick is to not fully tighten all the screws until you get all of them all inserted and threaded. You'll need the wiggle room to line up the holes to screw the legs together. Afterward, tighten all the long screws holding the legs together, then tighten the smaller ones to the big metal ring. I looked at many end tables before finding these.
customer_reviews.author: CryptonicSonic

customer_reviews.title: Happy with theses tables!!
customer_reviews.text: Happy happy happy!! First table was an A$$ but once I figured out to put all four legs on first then add all the long screws to all 4 legs but only put in just a tad to get them all aligned, then go back and slowly one by one tighting them little by little works much better and faster! Love these tables!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new table!!!!! They're very good quality and easy to assemble (after reading the picture instructions and then throwing them away)😉 Took about 35 minutes for the first table ( large cocktail) and about 10 every table after that . I'm very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Nunya

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the end table. Not top quality but then again it was only $95. It's attractive but I don't necessarily like the look at the point where all the legs meet. The screws used aren't that noticeable. Would have preferred it without the black ring on the perimeter of the table top. No regrets though. A good value for the price. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: chrome and glass table
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to use as a lamp table when I was living in an apartment in New York City. My style is contemporary and this table was a perfect fit for our small space. However, it was difficult to assemble and the instructions were not clear.
customer_reviews.author: watergirl

customer_reviews.title: Sophisticated!
customer_reviews.text: The table is very nice with a sophisticated contemporary design. It has taken me a little bit of time to put together, but that's because I take my time. The glass top is heavy and beautiful. You'll enjoy this design and the price point can't be beat!
customer_reviews.author: The Encouraging One

customer_reviews.title: Definite value
customer_reviews.text: We just needed a "for now" solution to go with our new living room set, since we couldn't spend hundreds more for the fancy stuff. Took a chance and bought one of these, liked it so much went ahead and puchased a second one. It's true it has the kind of flaws you'd expect for the price, mostly in the coating on the metal legs, but honestly you'll only notice this during assembly, but once it's together and in place it fits right in with the high end furniture. The glass is great quality and we are very happy our cheap for now turned into a bargain for good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great table
customer_reviews.text: This table is nicer than I thought it would be. It’s the perfect size and fit for our family room. We got it on sale and couldn’t believe the quality especially for the price. When we got it we received only two legs instead of four but we called Amazon and they sent us another table and picked up the faulty one. So all in all we are very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R.

customer_reviews.title: Clashes with everything
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice, but there are some issues. The main issue is that the style is too unique. I clashes with everything. Also, because the legs are curved, assembly is more difficult than other furniture. Lastly, the legs were all scratched when I got them.
customer_reviews.author: LordBlacksilver

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition.
customer_reviews.text: This class top table gives my living room a more finished look. My brother put it together for me. It took him less than 20 minutes to assemble the table. It looks more expensive than it was. As another reviewer stated it does have a black band around the edge of the glass. I don't think it takes away too much from the table.

customer_reviews.title: A very glamorous piece and easy to assemble The package arrived intact and well protected
customer_reviews.text: A very glamorous piece and easy to assemble The package arrived intact and well protected. Now I have all three tables and have completed my LR. The price was right and advertised as expected, well made. Thank you Coaster Home Furnishings ! I Love them and you will too. SHOP THE AMAZON EXPERIENCE.

customer_reviews.title: The glass top was also a relatively good thickness, complimenting the unit
customer_reviews.text: Well... I have to say... I thought I was taking a chance by ordering this end table, but I was pleasantly surprised with the product and quality. The chrome legs were solid and well built. The glass top was also a relatively good thickness, complimenting the unit. After unpacking and looking at the instructions, it seemed I was going to end up with trial & error during assembly, but things went well. If you take a few minutes to read the instructions, lay out the sections and hardware and take it one step at a time, you'll be fine.

product_meta.title: Norwood End Table with Tempered Glass Top Chrome and Clear
product_meta.description: Artfully designed, this end table makes a striking statement. The graceful curves of its base flow together elegantly for a sophisticated look. A chrome finish adds brilliant shine and cool, contemporary appeal. Its top is constructed from tempered glass, accentuated by a bold, black frame around the edge. Whether placed in a den or a foyer, this table creates a decorative display for cherished memories.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars244 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
